name: What does my cat do at night?
name_original: What does my cat do at night?
description:
As a newly adopted kitten, you have come into a completely new world. Every night you sneak out of the house, to learn just a little bit more about it . . .

But be careful! If you don't get back to your owner's side by 6am, they might foil your sneaky plans!

Controls

WASD or ARROW KEYS - movement
SPACE - interact / pick up items / put down items
TAB - switch between items

Created By

  • rubr - design / art / code
  • ovrbi - design / code
  • Jessica Robo - sound effects

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 80.
